name: Vrozar Genesis
description:
This is just a passion project. To do something on my free time, however I will try to update the game as much as I can :P. It won't be a good game (can't guarantee it anyways), but just the process is fun for me, so hope you'll enjoy it.

System Requirements*:                                                                                                            


Windows  MacOS:Windows 8.1/10Mac OS 10.10 or betterCPU:Intel Core2 Duo or BetterIntel Core2 Duo or BetterRam2GB2GBStorage500MB600MB

*System Requirements subject to change
